{"step_by_step_thinking": "Slow tooth separation is a method used in orthodontics to create space between teeth. This can be achieved by using different materials and techniques. The use of 26 gauge spring wire around proximal contacts is a common method for slow tooth separation. Soft brass wire can also be used for this purpose. Oversized resin is another method used to slowly separate teeth. Therefore, all of the mentioned methods can be used for slow tooth separation.", "answer_choice": "D"}
